title: An Interview with John Balloch
brief_description: John Balloch was at school when war was declared. Even so, he couldn’t wait to sign up. He wanted to be a fighter pilot, flying alone. He tells of his training and time serving in the RAAF during World War II and pays tribute to those lost, both to the enemy and accidents.
